Module com.fasterxml.classmate
Package com.lcoprobe.acbs.wrapper

Class LCOEchoWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lcoprobe.acbs.wrapper.LCOEchoWrapper
  • @Configuration
public class LCOEchoWrapper
extends Object
    Probes the LANSA LCO listener to establish if the listener is active or not.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Osvaldo Martini
